info.name: NOS.nl - no ads, shows visited links.
info.description:
Gives already visited links a different color from unvisited links.

Removes the ad banner div from the NOS site.
info.additionalInfo:
2021-05-18: Finally found the time to update for the new site, probably won't cover everything, but's a start.

2020-08-28: Fixed top of page flyouts.

2020-08-21: Added Tour de France section.

2020-02-13: Added Collections.

2020-01-10: More updates for link blocks.

2019-12-24: Update for homepage article blocks.

2019-11-12: More updates for link blocks.

2019-10-30: More updates for link blocks.

2019-12-06: Updated Top Stories links.

2019-10-04: More updates for in article links.

2019-09-05: More updates for in article links and the liveblogs.

2019-07-09: Updated to work with new styles on the site.

2015-05-18: Removed vertical Feedback button.

2014-19-11: Totally new NOS website, so a totally new style sheet.

style.css:
@-moz-document domain("nos.nl")
{
li[class*="sc-2i23mm-0"] a:visited, /* Main page Laatste nieuws */
li[class*="sc-1o48lwo-1"] a:visited div, /* Main page Top Stories */
li[class*="hi15ra-0"] a[class*="iZCmy"]:visited div h2, /* Main page blocks */
li[class*="tbqfhm-0"] a[class*="NaOUj"]:visited div h2, /* Main page big block */
li[class*="ec39x2-3"] a[class*="iZCmy"]:visited div h2, /* Main page Uitgelegd, Sport, Gemist? blocks */
li[class*="ec39x2-3"] a[class*="jkaIWH"]:visited div h2, /* Main page Collecties block */

div[class*="contentBlock"] a:visited,
li[class*="listItem"] a:visited span, /* Bekijk ook */
li[class*="listItem"] a:visited h2, /* Three article block under article */

div[class*="collectionPage"] a:visited div[class*="title"], /* Collecties, pic block */
div[class*="collectionPage"] a:visited p[class*="title"], /* Collecties, video's */
div[class*="collectionPage"] a:visited h4, /* Collecties, Meer articelen */

div[data-ssr-name*="pages/Collection/Videos/Videos"] a:visited span[class*="itemTitle"], /* Collections Video page */

section[id="latest_videos"] a:visited span[class*="title"], /* Videos pages */

div[class*="relatedArticles"] a:visited p[class*="Title"], /* Video page, Deze video komt voor in */

section[id="latest_in_category"] a:visited h3, /* Nieuws section pages */

section[id="archive"] a:visited div[class*="title"] /* Archief pages */

{
color: #888 !important;
}
}
